name: SpaceRufflers
description:
Description:

SpaceRufflers is a 2D space shooter game where you use a selection of weapon power ups to help you fight through the endless waves of enemies. The end goal is to survive long enough  until the evil dreadnought appears. You know when it has arrived through the sound it makes. Defeat the dreadnought and win the game.

Controls:

W - Move forward

A & D - Rotate left or right.

Spacebar - Shoot power ups.

ESC = Access menu options.

The power ups will not last forever as indicated by the blue bar in the game. After the timer has run out or picked up another power up box, you will get either the default weapon or a weapon.
